                        java.lang.Boolean keepRoles)
                          throws PermissionCheckFailureException
        Set the value of EXT_AUTH_KEEP_ROLES
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        keepRoles - True if we should keep temporary roles between login sessions
        Returns:
        1 on success
        Throws:
        PermissionCheckFailureException - if the user is not a Sat admin

      • getKeepTemporaryRoles

        public boolean getKeepTemporaryRoles(User loggedInUser)
                              throws PermissionCheckFailureException
        Get the value of EXT_AUTH_KEEP_ROLES
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        Returns:
        True if we should keep roles after users log in through non-IPA method, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        PermissionCheckFailureException - if the user is not a Sat admin
